long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YeaVoice's API integration platform provides database driven screen pops.  The YeaVoice click to call app integrates with back-office applications using APIs (Sales Force, Zendesk, etc) by leveraging APIs the YeaVoice click to call extension will search any internal database and present the findings in a new window.  The YeaVoice's app (extension) also recognizes any phone number presented in Chrome and transforms it into a clickable link for seamless click to dial (call).
